hero.title: Our Story
hero.subtitle: Twelve years of forming young minds. One unwavering commitment: excellence with integrity.
hero.narrative: This school exists for a reason. Not to fill rankings or chase metrics, but to form young people who will think deeply, act with courage, and contribute meaningfully to the world.

narrative_section.story: In 2013, Sheikh Hassan Muhammad Mwaita envisioned something different. A school where Islamic values weren't separate from academics, but woven through every subject, every conversation, every moment. A place where young minds could excel intellectually while remaining spiritually grounded. What began as a dream has become a reality.
narrative_section.founding: Founded on a simple conviction: education is not the transmission of information, but the formation of character. Over twelve years, we have grown from a small initiative to one of Eastern Uganda's most respected educational institutions, serving 250+ students from diverse backgrounds.

vision.title: We envision a world where our graduates...
statements: think critically and act with conviction
remain anchored in Islamic values while engaging the wider world

mission.title: Our commitment is clear:
mission.statement: We form young people through rigorous Islamic and secular education. We nurture intellectual courage, spiritual depth, and moral clarity. We prepare leaders, not just students.

coreValues.title: Integrity
coreValues.description: We don't believe in shortcuts. Integrity is not negotiable—it's the foundation of everything we do.

coreValues.title: Intellectual Depth
coreValues.description: We value rigorous thinking over surface-level learning. Our students learn to ask hard questions and think critically.

coreValues.title: Rooted in Faith
coreValues.description: Islamic values are not a subject we teach; they are the lens through which we see the world. They shape how we learn, lead, and serve.

coreValues.title: The Whole Person
coreValues.description: We form the intellectual, spiritual, physical, and moral dimensions of each young person. Education is holistic or it is incomplete.

coreValues.title: Moral Courage
coreValues.description: We cultivate young people who will stand for what is right, even when it is difficult. Courage is not the absence of fear; it is action despite it.

coreValues.title: Community
coreValues.description: We belong to one another. Students, parents, teachers, leadership—we are a community committed to one another's growth.

leadership.title: Our Leadership
leadership.introduction: The school is guided by experienced educators deeply committed to Islamic education and student welfare.

members.name: Sheikh Hassan Muhammad Mwaita
members.title: Director & Founder
members.bio: With over 20 years of experience in Islamic education and school management, Sheikh Hassan has dedicated his life to building educational excellence grounded in Islamic values. His vision transformed a dream into a thriving institution serving the region.

discipline.title: A Culture of Discipline
discipline.introduction: Discipline at Excel School is not punitive—it is constructive. We believe that discipline is an expression of care and prepares students for success.
principles: Clear expectations: Students know what is expected of them
Consistent enforcement: Rules are applied fairly and consistently
Support and growth: Discipline is an opportunity for learning and growth
Respect and dignity: Every student is treated with respect
Parental partnership: Parents are involved in supporting school values

achievement.title: Our Achievements
highlights: 98% student success rate in national examinations

institutionalProof.title: Institutional Strength
institutionalProof.subtitle: Established. Structured. Stable.
institutionalProof.introduction: Excellence is not promised overnight. It is built year by year, through consistency, commitment, and care. Here's what makes Excel a stable, legitimate institution.

sections.title: 12 Years of Service
sections.description: More than a decade of consistent educational excellence. We are not a startup experimenting with education—we are an established institution with proven track record.

sections.title: Complete Education Spectrum
sections.description: We serve students from age 3 through 13 (Nursery through Primary 7). A continuous educational journey, not fragmented programs.

sections.title: Growing Community
sections.description: Parents trust us with their children. Our enrollment reflects the confidence families place in our institution and our commitment to them.

sections.title: Qualified Faculty
sections.description: Experienced, qualified educators who are not just teaching, but mentoring and forming young people.

sections.title: Boarding & Day Options
sections.description: We serve both day and boarding students, demonstrating our capacity and commitment to families from across the region.

sections.title: Inclusive Community
sections.description: We serve students from diverse ethnic, religious, and socioeconomic backgrounds. Our institution is welcoming and equitable.
